thread.section_title: ToursByLocals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ToursByLocals | www.toursbylocals.com
thread.title: Sacha Breuer

author: Sacha Breuer
title: Sacha Breuer
text:
I enjoyed my stay with Sotath by all means. I booked a tour for 4 days together which I ended doing alone with him and felt very comfortable. His English is good but with a small local accent.
I discovered a very interesting character, knowing everything I asked about the places we visited but also shared some interesting more individual thoughts once I engaged the conversation on other topics. Sotath has a high level of education which adds to the quality of his tour, without being stiff or humorless.
